item.description:
Sunday 10 am to 5 pm.  HD Cycles is kind enough to allow us to share some of their space!  Help us promote Women On Wheels and raise money for the Breast Cancer Research Dept at Tufts Medical Center, Boston. 

 

The Springfield Motorcycle Show is a high-end, top shelf motorcycle event that brings together a great combination of bike builders, manufacturers and retailers in a rocking atmosphere that delivers fun and enjoyment for the whole family!

If you are just looking to have a good time and beat the winter blues, the Springfield Motorcycle Show has something for you.
item.name: Springfield Bike Show
